atom3d.protein package¶

Submodules¶

atom3d.protein.scop module¶

Functions related to SCOP classes of structures.

atom3d.protein.scop.get_scop_index()¶

Get index mapping from PDB code and chain to SCOP classification.

atom3d.protein.sequence module¶

Code relating to biomolecular sequence.

atom3d.protein.sequence.fasta_name_to_tuple(x)¶

Fasta names can only be strings. This code gets the tuples back out.

atom3d.protein.sequence.find_cluster_members(pdb, clusterings)¶

Find all other pdbs that co-occur in a cluster with a given pdb

atom3d.protein.sequence.find_similar(chain_sequences, blast_db, cutoff, num_alignments)¶

Find all other pdbs that have sequence identity greater than cutoff.

atom3d.protein.sequence.get_all_chain_sequences(pdb_dataset)¶

Return list of tuples of (pdb_code, chain_sequences) for PDB dataset.

atom3d.protein.sequence.get_all_chain_sequences_df(df)¶

Return list of tuples of (struct_name, chain_sequences) for sharded.

atom3d.protein.sequence.get_chain_sequences(pdb_file)¶

Return list of chain sequences from PDB file.

Takes the form of list of (chain name, sequence string).

atom3d.protein.sequence.get_pdb_clusters(id_level, pdb_ids=None)¶

Downloads pre-calculated clusters from PDB at given cutoff. Returns dictionaries mapping PDB IDs to cluster IDs and vice versa.

atom3d.protein.sequence.tuple_to_fasta_name(structure_name, chain_name)¶

Fasta names can only be strings. This code writes the tuples in.

atom3d.protein.sequence.write_fasta(chain_sequences, outfile)¶

Write chain_sequences to fasta file.

atom3d.protein.sequence.write_to_blast_db(all_chain_sequences, blast_db)¶

Write provided chain sequences to blast db, for use with BLAST.

Inputs: - all_chain_sequences: list of (structure name, chain_sequences)
